JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: warehouse worker for a large warehouse in Horsens
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you a logistics superhero who masters the art of picking and packing in a large warehouse? 

And are you ready for new challenges, personal growth and to be part of a team that values your development? Then we have the perfect position for you as a temp worker at DSV in Horsens. 

At DSV, you will become a part of an ambitious company with a dynamic work environment that values quality and collaboration. It is essential that you are proactive and take the initiative to tackle both significant and small tasks since you will play a crucial role within a team, contributing to maintaining and ensuring smooth operations.

working tasks include:
• Picking and packing using a hand-held scanner
• Goods reception, registration, scanning and entry of goods 
• Tidying up and preparing the warehouse 

your colleagues say that
• You take responsibility for your own working tasks
• You are proactive
• You prioritize quality, efficiency, and helpfulness 

start-up and employment
• We offer a full time position where start-up is as soon as possible.
• Working hours: Monday to Thursday from 7 AM to 3 PM & Friday from 7 AM to 2:30 PM 
• Payment in accordance with qualifications and local agreement  

about randstad
Randstad is the world’s largest talent company and a partner of choice to clients. As a Partner for Talent, we are committed to providing equitable opportunities to people from all backgrounds and helping them remain relevant in the rapidly changing world of work. 

We have a deep understanding of the labour market and help our clients to create the high-quality, diverse and agile workforces they need to succeed. We support people to realise their true potential throughout their entire working life. This is what we do and what motivates us every day.

Randstad DK is part of the international Randstad Group. Every day, we help more than 600,000 people around the world find jobs. We specialise in finding, attracting, and retaining skilled talent to power businesses at speed and at scale. Randstad DK is a leader in this field, with offices in Copenhagen, Aarhus, Aalborg, and Kolding.
